mapper.sql: select c1.id, c1.code, c1.description from code c1 join code c2 on c1.p_id = c2.id where c2.code = 'CATEGORY'
mapper.select: select c.*, ce.effect, concat(a.first_name,' ', a.last_name) as name, tmp.num_of_video as numOfVideo, ct.description as category_name from course c left join course_effect ce on c.id = ce.course_id left join account a on c.account_id = a.id left join (select count(id) as num_of_video, course_id from video v group by course_id) tmp on c.id = tmp.course_id left join () ct on c.category_id = ct.id

select c.*, ce.effect, concat(a.first_name,' ', a.last_name) as name, tmp.num_of_video as numOfVideo, ct.description as category_name from course c left join course_effect ce on c.id = ce.course_id left join account a on c.account_id = a.id left join (select count(id) as num_of_video, course_id from video v group by course_id) tmp on c.id = tmp.course_id left join () ct on c.category_id = ct.id where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into course( title , account_id , description , profile_image , root_price , price , active , type , category_id , create_time , create_user_id) values ( #{title}, #{accountId}, #{description}, #{profileImage}, #{rootPrice}, #{price}, #{active}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, now(), #{accountId})
